transactiontypes.lbrent: Earn money by renting out items that are sitting around or save money by renting what you need without buying.

homepage.lbworks: Follow these simple steps to get started with Vizzy.

steps.1Lb: Log in and customize your profile to start exploring the available offers.
steps.2lb: Describe your product, add photos and define whether you want to sell, exchange or rent.
steps.3Lb: Receive offers, chat with other users and complete the transaction securely.
